website_summaries.verdict: It has a stylish design and an affordable price tag, but it's not the best choice if you need a large clock you can read from a distance.
pros: Stylish faux-stone exterior available in 2 shades
Weather-resistant cover for the clock motor to keep out rain
cons: Smaller size makes it harder to read from a distance, especially the temperature and humidity gauges

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work even one year!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock June 3, 2017 and used it outside during the summer. I brought it inside during the winter and removed the battery. Yesterday, March 30, 2018, I got it out and put a battery in it to use outside again this year. IT DOES NOT WORK. I am not happy, it did not last even one year! I realize this was not an expensive item, but I did take good care of it! UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It is outside. It keeps time ok, a bit slow, loses about a minute a day so I will have to reset it every few days.. Humidity gage may be accurate I don't know what the actual humidity is right now so I cant say but the thermometer is wrong big time. It says it is -20 here now. Actually is 80 degrees. I bought it for the clock which is ok, It looks nice but it is not great It isn't worth my time and money to return it
customer_reviews.author: tcn

customer_reviews.title: This was a beautiful clock, but after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful clock, but after a few months, it stopped. They sent me a replacement and that ALSO stopped working. So disappointed because now I'm stuck with two non-working clocks.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie C.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult  to review
customer_reviews.text: The clock itself is great - looks good, works correctly. Dials are adjustable. It arrived with the glass face shattered; the pins holding it in place ripped out. The problem was the packaging. The clock was in its own box, in a styrofoam brace. That box was inside a larger Amazon box, moving around loosely except for one piece of folded paper that did not fill the space between the smaller box and shipping box. So while the clock itself is a good one, the packaging by Amazon was very negligent.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Scott

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful piece, but it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful piece, but it stopped working, because the minute hand became lodged underneath the hour hand. I then had to dismantle it to dislodge the hands, only to discover how 'inexpensively' the face (and mechanisms) were made.... To date, I have dismantled it 3 times to align the hands, so that they don't interlock with one another. It could be that ambient heat (or sun) contorts the hands (bending them inward), nevertheless I would have expected not to have these issues with a simple outdoor clock. Also, the face, and supporting timepiece is of disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is good because it is not too heavy to hang
customer_reviews.text: It feels plastic, which is good because it is not too heavy to hang, but I am curious to see how long it stands up to the Florida weather, even in the shade. So far it seems to keep time well and is quiet. Looks nice, except my husband seems to hang everything crooked. Even when I'm hanging things, I'll ask him if it looks straight, he will say yes, but when I get down and look at it, I'll find it is obviously askew. It has happened enough with so many different things (drapes, pictures, mirrors, etc.) that I suspect it is my husband's neck that needs adjusting, not the clock
customer_reviews.author: Wittily Writ Publishing

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, bought it to blend with the color of my wall. The product is exactly as it is shown. The size is just right to be viewed while in the pool across the courtyard. Negatives are the white face, I wish it blended more with the surrounding tiles. Also, the glass isn’t non-glare so it reflects the foreground making it difficult to see. I have it in a wall facing the west so morning sunshine shouldn’t be an issue, but it is.
customer_reviews.author: TrishB

customer_reviews.title: Just received 2 days ago and love it!
customer_reviews.text: My old outdoor clock bit the dust and found this one that is much more attractive against the stucco wall on my lanai! Just received 2 days ago and love it!!! would recommend to anyone wanting an outdoor clock that looks great and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love the stone look
customer_reviews.text: We needed something that looked nice but functioned well outside. We live in Florida where it is hot and humid nearly year round, we like our outdoor space and spend a lot of time outside. This stylish clock was the perfect addition. We hung it on the house so when I am in the swim spa I can easily see how much time until my lunch period is done and I need to get back to work. It has a handy thermometer as well... hot is hot but sometimes it is nice to know how hot lol
customer_reviews.author: veryldylike

customer_reviews.title: NOT ACCURATE!
customer_reviews.text: Live in NY temp here today is 79 degrees - clock hanging up for days already and thermometer reads about 90 degrees - not accurate and not worth the price tag! Extremely disappointed! Returning for sure
customer_reviews.author: Tara L

customer_reviews.title: we've had it for a week and so far so good. The quality and look of the clock is ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars instead of 5 is b/c I wish the face of the clock was a little larger. I did read a review before purchasing that mentioned it, so I was prepared, I just wish it was s little bigger. Other than that, we've had it for a week and so far so good. The quality and look of the clock is great. It's kept perfect time, and temp seems to be pretty accurate. It's outside under our eaves and I hope it holds up well. Battery compartment has a cover to help keep the elements out. Very happy w/ look, quality, and so far function of the clock.
customer_reviews.author: KBean16

customer_reviews.title: outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly on our patio. Does exactly what it says it does. Time, humidity and temp. I will update if there are any issues that seem useful to update with. I will say, it is very heavy too. There is a lip on the back ... and a sort of "stem" for you to use for hanging. It is pretty weighty so I do recommend a molly or a stud installation.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Tick Tock - this is mostly a Clock!
customer_reviews.text: Love this outdoor clock. The design goes with our style and the stone on our house beautifully. And I can see the clock from almost anywhere on our porch or across from my husband's shop. HOWEVER, the thermometer and humidity gauge are a joke. So small, and the temperature gauge is impossible to give any kind of accurate reading. It gives you a ballpark reading - like you can read that it's in the 80's. But I can tell that just from being outside. So that part is a disappointment. But I'm not sorry I have the clock.
customer_reviews.author: A Cheap Read

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the time.  BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing the same clock, which I'd had for many years ... or so I thought, as this one was a few inches smaller. My mistake, but it has proven hard to read from the pool. Sadly, though, the thermometer has proven to be far from accurate. Unless today was 122 degrees outside. Which it wasn't. And the humidity readings are also far from what the local weather folks say it is. So this has become a clock that I can't read and a thermometer & hygrometer combo I cannot count on. But it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: WJR

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on a tickin...
customer_reviews.text: Second year and working. This is in the brutal California desert sun for half the day and it does not looked weathered or aged. We take it in the house during the winter months, not because of temperature, because of strong winds
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Not very good for outside use
customer_reviews.text: Time, humidity, and temperature work just fine inside but outside the thermometer does not work well (5-7 degrees off). The design does not permit air to get behind the clock so the thermometer responds to the temperature of whatever you hang the clock on. I put some 1/4" spacers to lift the clock off a brick wall. Helped some. Going to increase to1/2" and hope for the best. The humidistat is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: Love my clock, as for the temperature reader, it works great you have to calibrate it first( leave it inside at a consistent temp for an hour then you can put it outside) people don’t read... this is an amazing clock loos great and works I have had mine no problem love it.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock. It worked great for about a month. It stopped running. Changed the battery, the wheel to move the hands goes in clockwise direction only. I was difficult to twist and kept coming off. So I set my IPhone alarm on the time it stopped running. That battery lasted 3 days. so sad
customer_reviews.author: M. Peckenpaugh

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works perfect
customer_reviews.text: We needed a clock for our deck and pool, so have it mounted on an exterior wall facing west. There is no good place to put it where it is visible everywhere we need it and stay out of the sun, so the thermometer doesn't read correctly in the afternoons after the sun hits it. That's as expected, though. The clock keeps perfect time, and as far as I can tell, so does the barometer, or hydrometer, whatever. It looks great against our white siding.
customer_reviews.author: Chronic Caver

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I use this on an outside patio that gets 100+ in the summer. Most clocks only tolerate that for a year or 2 at most. So I can't comment on its durability yet. It is attractive and is large enough to read from 30 or more feet away. Only con is that the thick frame around the clock makes it impossible to read from a severe side angle. But overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Craig

customer_reviews.title: No product warranty
customer_reviews.text: Product does look good. We figured that spending more money on this product would be justified. But, we could have done as well for less at our local Lowes store. We don't feel it's worth the extra money for where we want to hang it. and then to find out that it'll cost us $9 to return it. So be it.
customer_reviews.author: William Perry

customer_reviews.title: nice looking clock
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this clock. Had to give only 3 stars because I have to return because the clock hand can not clear the humidity hands and gets stuck. I can hit it to clear, but defeats the purpose to unstick your clock several times a day. It is a shame because I mainly only care for time and temperature, could really care less about the humidity reading. Could not figure out how to open and take humidity hands off to resolve problem.
customer_reviews.author: a shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Outdoor Clock
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this clock! We have it outside in our hot tub area. It hung easy and the time hasn't failed us yet. The temperature doesn't always seem completely accurate when it's colder, but we bought it more so for the clock/time aspect. Our house is a light olive green-esque color and it matches our house and decor perfectly. It's lasted us through a cold winter, snowstorms, and heavy rains and hasn't stopped ticking yet!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Clock!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this clock for our patio and out of the box it was accurate with no adjustments needed. Looks great on the wall. There are covers on the back to adjust humidity and temperature if it's not accurate. Note: the 10" clock offered does NOT have adjustments as I found out when I bought it. Returned it for this one.
customer_reviews.author: MD-11 Driver

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: The clock size fits great on our deck post. It is very attractive and easy to read. We had to recalibrate the thermometer but this is something that was outlined in the instruction sheet. Temperature gage works good now.
customer_reviews.author: bunnybob

customer_reviews.title: Looks good with our backyard decor!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for several months for an outdoor clock/thermometer but I either found clocks that were very cheaply made and cheaply looking or they were very nice and expensive (over $100). I really didn't want to spend that much money on a clock I planned to leave to the outdoor yearly weather, but I almost did, until I found this clock. This faux finished clock/thermometer exactly what I was looking for at a price I can easily live with.
customer_reviews.author: Nica

customer_reviews.title: Item is attractive and met my expectations.  Pictorial representation of product was accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Package tracking indicated delivery date of 5/13/19. Since I did not receive the package on the date promised, I checked the site, which indicated the package had been delivered as promised on 5/13/19. There was a photo of the package as it was left at the delivery site. From the photo, I was able to determine that the package was left in error at 620 rather than the correct address of 619. I was able to recognize the location from the photo and went next door yesterday evening to retrieve the package. Fortunately, it was still there on the doorstep and was protected from the rain--my neighbors are away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 2
customer_reviews.text: 0 for 2. The clock looks really nice, but we've had two non- functioning units and I give up. First clock hands wouldn't move, second one hands got stuck and minute hand could not get by hour hand. I'll try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Doc J

customer_reviews.title: Time and other features seem very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new clock for our patio and this has withstood rain, snow and heavy winds. It looks nice too and is easy to read. Temperature and barometer are as accurate as our high-tech unit. I'd buy it again if for some reason it fell and broke which I doubt it will.
customer_reviews.author: SJones

customer_reviews.title: Help!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally missing something... No paperwork included. Inserted battery. Doesn't work. Is there a magic button???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock. Exactly as advertised. Feels well-made but does has a bit of weight to it. Had to put a screw into the siding to hold it, afraid clip would not do the job. It is under an overhang, therefore can't comment on durability after being exposed to the weather. The face is covered by clear plastic so it is protected from getting dirty. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lucy H

customer_reviews.title: Plastic broke on back = shattered clock
customer_reviews.text: Hung this up outside (I made sure it was correctly secured on the screw) and within 10 minutes the back plastic broke and this heavy clock fell, shattering on the ground. I liked look and color but since I could even enjoy it for a day it only gets 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: dancing1821

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clock, accurate time keeper
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clock, accurate time keeper, heavy-duty construction that looks great by our pool. Clock motor is protected in its own sealed compartment. This clock is built to be outdoors, unlike some other clocks that are advertised as being "weatherized" this one actually is. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pool area
customer_reviews.text: We have been through many outdoor clocks in the pool area, mostly due to them being exposed to the elements out there, even though we have a screened pool enclosure and this clock is under the overhang. This one will surely last much longer since it's well made, components are covered, the face is covered and protected. Looks great against the exterior stucco wall.
customer_reviews.author: Toonces

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking clock
customer_reviews.text: We got this clock to replce an old outdoor clock on our screened porch. Very pleased with the appearance. The clock seems well made and keeps accurate time. The temperatue also has the correct reading. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jrh1194

customer_reviews.title: Did not last.
customer_reviews.text: It did not endure the cold or the heat. The clocks arms are loose. Cannot be repaired. Only 3 months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Stevens

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to give this clock 5 stars until I noticed the temperature is not correct, it was correct the first couple of weeks. The clock keeps time well. I love the look of the clock, it is perfect for my lanai. These are the times I wish I had gone to a local store and bought a clock that I could easily exchange or return.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: hung crooked
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty clock. I have it hung outside so I can keep an eye on the time, temp, and humidity. Unfortunately, it doesn't hang straight. I got it to work using another nail, but I rather wouldn't have had to put another hole in my siding.
customer_reviews.author: Bethnay S. Wojahn

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and it is perfect for my patio
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and it is perfect for my patio. It is hard to read the Fahrenheit dial accurately it is very small, and meant to be read in Celsius. I will continue to look for something more suited for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA KASSAL

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT buy this again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this outdoor clock because it will match with the new patio we were having installed. I went to hang it on the wall of our garage on a screw and gave it a tug to make sure it was secure. The hanging bracket on the back of the clock broke off. I am in the process of re gluing it on though it shouldn't have broke off to begin with. I would NOT buy this again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S

customer_reviews.title: Love the stone
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous clock, looks and feels high quality. Love the stone, which I would think was real except that description says it is not. Colors are as shown and perfect for our decor. A very nice size. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer since 1999

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I wanted color instead old brown & plain. I like the material it is made from. Attractive and stands out. Seemed to be accurate. No not too heavy to handle. Perfect for me on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: junk. Stopped working after a month. Not a battery issue either. I want my money back but window is closed....
customer_reviews.author: Urusuki

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock so far
customer_reviews.text: Clock arrived well packed and damage free. Easy to hang/ instructions clear. Keeps perfect time and temp gauge is accurate. Humidity gauge seems low but instructions are clear regarding calibration. It has only been up 3 days on patio wall, So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Petke

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The only wish I have it that it would glow or light up at night but it’s very nice and good quality
customer_reviews.author: nannette morrison

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and resilient
customer_reviews.text: I had a clock of a well known brand; however, let's just say that it was neither accurate nor right. This clock, however, is very accurate and very resilient. It is mounted on a wall outdoors by the pool, and is exposed to Texas sun and rain on a regular basis. So far, it just keeps on ticking.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this clock in the off white version but returned it because it looked like it needed to be cleaned, which was their intention in making it look distressed, but guests over at to house will just think it's dirty. Ordered this one instead and it looks great, seems to be solid construction. I have it hanging on our fence and really nice when I'm outside with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen's Books

customer_reviews.title: Time flys
customer_reviews.text: Tells time. Attractive. Temperature works great. Only complaint is that it sticks out from the wall a good 3 inches. This causes you to have to be in front of the clock to read it. Not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsheylmun

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my front porch. It's easy to read and really looks good with the brick on my house. When I'm outside working in yard or doing other things it's great to be able to keep track of the time. It also has a temperature gauge which it very handy. I'd recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: clara bolejack

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Clock
customer_reviews.text: Hung this clock on my deck. It is a great size and keeps time well. Heavy,so make sure to secure it well. If it falls it will fall apart. This is my second purchase for this clock.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this clock. It came well packaged with good instructions. The clock, thermometer, and hygrometer all seem to work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Good time keeper, not so much on pressure and temperature
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice outdoor clock. It handled some pretty hot Texas days in a shaded part of the back yard. It's kept good time in summer, we'll see how it does in winter. The barometric pressure and temperature gauges have not been particularly reliable, but they give the clock a nice outdoor look. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Frank DLT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Keep Time
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good. Time slows, requiring re-setting every day or two. Disappointed. Not the batteries. We changed and tested them, put them in another clock where they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Talk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's well made. The colors are beautifully soft and compliment the walls and our wood ceiling. Numbers are large enough to see from the pool. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: This clock arrived in pieces, the face disconnected from the frame. The screw holes were stripped making it impossible to put together. This had clearly been returned from another customer. We returned it also. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this outdoor clock. The clock numbers are large enough to see from any place on our patio. It has a nice weight about it - not plastic at all. Also looks upscale with the design. It was easy to hang as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maria in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Are outdoor clock finally broke so this was are replacement love it stylish easy too read has went through some bad weather and has fallen off wall but still works great
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Only good as a clock
customer_reviews.text: Only good as a clock, which is what I wanted. Temperature and humidity are always off, even after several adjustments
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. I got this for my patio after having house painted. I looks even better live. So glad I got this one. I don’t know about battery life yet, but this one is alot easier to put batteries in. Changing is going to be snap now.
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Lover the looks. Hung it outside about 2 weeks ago and still works great. It does come with a warning though that it might accumulate humidity under the glass. I am also concerned about the battery life as we live near salt water. The back of the clock could have a better housing for an outdoor clock
customer_reviews.author: sunnyisle

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: First clock arrive damaged. Returned for a new one. Very easy to do. The second clock arrived in perfect condition. Have it on the wall in our screened in porch. Adds a very nice decorative piece to this room and the clock has been keeping perfect time.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Burns Jr.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful clock. So far working great and seems pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful clock. So far working great and seems pretty accurate on the humidity and temp. I did not have to adjust those--but apparently you can. but I'm pretty sure the reads are within just a couple clicks, so works good enough for the non-science life!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality, doesn't tell temperature correctly
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd clock and I'm extreamly dissatisfied with this item. The first one didn't tell temperature correctly and my 2nd one received the clock hands got caught on each other and also didn't tell temperature correctly. Don't waste your time or money on this item!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Younkin

customer_reviews.title: Broken and couldn’t use
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get this item for my mother for Christmas, but it was damaged when I received it. One of the bonding hooks (that connects the clock to the outer layer) was broken. I sent it in for a new one. When I received the new one, the glass on the front of the clock was broken. It’s a beautiful clock, but I couldn’t ever get one that’s not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn D.

customer_reviews.title: I gave this to my daughter for a Christmas gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter for a Christmas gift. Unfortunately she didn't tell me that the clock NEVER worked. The face is not sealed and water gets into it. I would have returned it, but didn't find out it was faulty until past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: April E. Gimlen

customer_reviews.title: Clock works but temp. And humidity meters do not
customer_reviews.text: Clock looks great, easy to read and accurate. The temperature and humidity meters do not work even after calibrating according to directions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clock
customer_reviews.text: Have had this clock for just a year We love the style and it matches the tile on our patio, but have to change the batteries ever 2 months. And there Good batteries at that
customer_reviews.author: melody brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clock
customer_reviews.text: We just bought this clock so can’t comment on long term functioning but it’s a beautiful clock with easy to read numbers. The darkest color slate is nearly black. The second darkest color is dark green which does not really show up as much in the picture on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Clock
customer_reviews.text: I bought two clocks slightly different -- met my husband's approval and both look wonderful in the house. Yes, in the house. They are too pretty to put out-of-doors.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: Happy with our new outdoor clock. Great for watching time when grilling of smoking foods. Glad to find a clock for outside. They are hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: j hyer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the as it has a temperature and humidity gauge ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw this one as I was looking for a replacement to ours that broke during a storm. I really like the as it has a temperature and humidity gauge on the face to see all three. Like the look of the clock as it fits outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Britton

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
customer_reviews.text: Outside in the rain, wind and heat - has been working now for 6 mos and very happy with it. Very easy to read from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Cathey carney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock Not flimsy Nice weight Hanging on my porch Looks like real stone So far very accurate Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stone clock with accurate readings!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clock. I've had it for several months, outside by the pool. So far, so good. The time, temperature and humidity readings have all been accurately aligned with the weatherman's readings on the news. The stone decor is very pretty and matches my pool deck to a tee! It's nice to keep track of the time from the pool!
customer_reviews.author: fiddledd53

customer_reviews.title: Great Style!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock! It looks great on the outdoor patio and the quality is better than I'd hope for. We're sure to get lots of compliments from our friends. Lily's Home is a great company to buy from if you are looking for the best quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking clock . . . . but
customer_reviews.text: The temperature does not work, it is about 8 degrees off. The barometer and clock seem to working fine though. The thermometer was an important feature in picking this clock.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: DId not work right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product because of the great reviews. I could have purchased a less expensive but similar product from Home Depot but decided to purchase this product due to the great reviews. The clock looks great and I wish it worked, but it did not. I but in a brand new battery and it worked for 5 minutes. I changes the battery again, but the same results. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the advertisement. The settings can be calibrated. It keeps wonderful time and is attractive on our lanai.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this outdoor clock 8/17 and it is already broken 5/18. Would NOT recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This clock looks great on our butter yellow wall. Wish it were larger so I could read the thermometer from a distance. That's about my eye sight not the fault of the clock. So far, seems accurate. Let's see how it fares during the winter's rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clock stopped working in less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock in November. It’s now May and the clock is no longer keeping accurate time or working properly. We have replaced the batteries. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Tick tock
customer_reviews.text: Just received the clock yesterday to replace one that stopped working. Really like the way it looks in contrast to the brick on our house, good size and easy to read. The battery compartment has a cover on it which is good for being outside. Satisfied so far!
customer_reviews.author: marcia, tomball, tx.

customer_reviews.title: Expect One-Year Life
customer_reviews.text: I have two outside. Both have been replaced over the course of two years. For whatever reason, I spent another $40 (twice) and have two more. Just not really good outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: It looks good!
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, and it can be read from a distance. A good value for an inexpensive clock.
customer_reviews.author: momofelikapekaandsons

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable! Doesn’t keep time!
customer_reviews.text: After only having 4 months, it is losing time and a complete waste of money! Since the return window has closed, I am out the purchase price. So frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The first clock we bought for our patio was junk (different brand) This one looks good, feels well made and all functions working perfectly after the first month.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: I received this clock, put a battery in and it didn’t work. How do you send back. Junk.
customer_reviews.text: I received this clock, put a battery in and it didn’t work. How do you send back. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: C Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great deck temperature and time clock
customer_reviews.text: Smart looking informational temp, humidity, time unit for the deck, Great investment, had lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy T

customer_reviews.title: a sturdy clock!
customer_reviews.text: it is lovely, sturdy matches the stone on my new home. Hopefully it is weather tolerant. hung in a sheltered place!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Zerebnick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the clock. Its been outside all summer. Great design and look for any patio!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice kitchen clock which looks good in my kitchen and I use it often
customer_reviews.author: Sara A. Rager

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Clock works just fine. Accurate, easy to read. Humidity reading is a mystery since we have nothing to check it with. Temp reading is accurate. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ross I Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on our patio, keeps correct time, temp and humidity readings.
customer_reviews.author: lovingliife

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Clock
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty clock, and looks much better than we thought it would. No idea about durability for outside, but worth the try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: This clock starts losing time. Tried replacing batteries. Still no luck. Didn't last 1 year. Sad !!!
customer_reviews.author: sheldon morgan

customer_reviews.title: Hands hit each other and stopped.
customer_reviews.text: Hour and minute hand hit each other. Had to remove clock, adjust hands and reassemble. Need to monitor to see if clock maintains correct time.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful, held up all summer in the weather and still looks brand new. I brought it in for the winter only because I didn’t want it to get ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good as a clock only
customer_reviews.text: This clock, thermometer, hygrometer combo is nice looking, but only the clock has any value. The thermometer is not accurate and the adjustment is useless. Don't know about the hygrometer, but like the thermometer, it is too small to see from any more than about 8 feet away. I'll be returning it as soon as I find a box.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Arms

customer_reviews.title: Functional and faux
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger and chunkier than I expected, and the slate surround definitely looks plastic faux. All functions appear to be working correctly, though. It's on point for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super nice outdoor clock! Very easy to read even from a distance!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Lily's Home Hanging Wall Clock, Includes a Thermometer and Hygrometer and is Ideal for Indoor and Outdoor Use, Wonderful Housewarming Gift for Friends, Faux-Stone (14 Inches)
feature_bullets: EXCELLENT FOR OUTDOOR USE: The Hanging Wall Clock with a Thermometer and Hygrometer is designed to work both indoors and outdoors and has been crafted to be weather resistant, whether rain, or snow, sleet, or sun! The clock itself has been designed with quartz movement and guarantees accurate timekeeping.

BUILT IN THERMOMETER AND HYGROMETER: This Hanging Wall Clock has been designed with a built-in thermometer and hygrometer. The thermometer can measure temperatures from -60 to 120 degrees Fahrenheit while the hygrometer can measure humidity from 0% to 100%. This piece is great for outdoor use in the garden, backyard, or by the pool!
BATTERY POWERED AND EASY TO MOUNT: The Hanging Wall Clock is battery powered and does not have any cords or cables. A single AA battery is required but is not included.

A PERFECT GIFT IDEA: Lily's Home makes a wide array of products for every home and garden lover. Whether you're looking for a perfect gift to spruce up your friend's garden, or if you need a housewarming present, Lily's Home has something for everyone!

MAKE A HOUSE A HOME: Lily’s Home offers beautifully designed clocks, dishware, garden decorations, and more to add a touch of style to any home. Whether you’re looking for a statement piece for your living room or looking for a way to add more color to your garden, Lily’s Home has just what you’re looking for!
